name: Full Stack Developer React/NodeJS Backend focused
description:
A London based ML/AI startup in the AdTech industry is seeking an experienced, dedicated, and well-organized Full Stack Software Engineer that will be mostly working on a backend.

The company is developing an AI-assisted platform that helps publishers and content makers to earn more money from their old post.

The startup is at an early stage and founded by a tech entrepreneur and ex-managing partner of Trencadis Corp and a software developing company that was an early sweat-equity investor in Genies.

We use google material design components, thus most of the work is done on the backend, and as the backend engineer you will develop:

  • 3d party services integration;

  • Processing/postprocessing statistics. Several apps are handling stats data streams and joining different data to provide advanced analytics for the end-users.

Requirements:

  • 3+ years of commercial experience as a Full Stack Developer;

  • Skilled with common technologies such as JS, TypeScript and their modern features;

  • Expert knowledge of NodeJS;

  • Practical experience with ReactJS;

  • At least Upper-Intermediate (B2) English.

Nice-to-have:

None of this is required but we will be impressed if you are:

  • Experience with the Google Analytics & Google Console APIs is preferred;

  • Experience with web scraping is preferred;

  • Experience with building Shopify Apps is highly preferred;

  • Experience with building performance marketing and ad tech products is preferred as it simplifies onboarding;

  • An understanding of digital marketing, affiliate marketing and online sales funnels is preferred as it simplifies onboarding.

Conditions:

  • Each dev will receive equity;

  • Remote work, flexible working hours;

  • Paid vacation and days off;

  • The company is happy to offer a reimbursement package for the newcomers up to $250.
